title: 820-00281 No SSD, Need advice!
message:
I need some logic board repair advice, I am repairing an 820-00281 that showed no ssd (soldered to board), and I ended up finding what the problem was, some liquid got on C8784 and removed the PP1V8_SSD_FMC pad (pad 1). I looked up the capacitor in the schematic PDF file and it shares PP1v8_SSD_FMC with C8783, 82, 81, 80. If I ran a wire from C8782 to C8784, would this complete the circuit? Correct me if im wrong

I provided photos too

title: 820-00281 No SSD, Need advice!
message:
Missing 1uF filter cap is not critical.
But you must check to have continuity on other componentts placed in the same power rail; as is possible to have corroded trace, inside the board.
Check for example from C8781 to C8782, small resistors, etc...
